recipe.title: someRecipe

ingredient.item: can Hunt's Garlic & Herb Pasta Sauce
cup dry large elbow macaroni, uncooked

recipe.directions: Cook bacon in saucepan 5 minutes or until crisp Remove bacon, leaving drippings in pan. Add vegetables in pan, cook and stir 2 minutes or until tender. Add pasta sauce, water, beans, and macaroni. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes or until macaroni is tender. Stir crumbled bacon into soup. Top each serving with cheese.
